item.description:
From DailyPaul.com:

This is a brand new event with a goal to raise one million dollars for Peter Schiff. The minimum goal is five hundred thousand -- if that figure is not reached, then all donations will be refunded. This ensures your donation is a part of a large media campaign that will have real impact!

The money will be spent on a television advertising blitz to help blast Peter Schiff past the primaries and on to the general election.

More information and pledge your support here: Million Dollar Money Bomb (go to dailypaul.com for link).

Ron Paul Forums thread on the topic here. (go to dailypaul.com for link)

Facebook page here http://www.facebook.c....

The comments on dailypaul.com pretty good too. One comment mentioned donate on schffforsenate.com rather than on dailypaul.com link. Keeping the tally here makes sense rather on the dailypaul.com.

Your choice of course.


Location is your computer!
Date 12:01 am Thursday July 29, 2010 - 12:00 am July 30, 2010.

PLEASE SHARE this with other meetup and grassroots groups!

barbara g.
item.name: Peter Shiff Million Dollar Money Bomb 7/29/10
